skills.skill: Software design experience with National Instrument Test Stand, LabVIEW RT and Veristand and Python
Hardware experience with interface circuits and Test Adapters
Test engineering experience with Mechanical Testing on mechanical components and systems (start systems, pneumatic systems or actuation systems) and/or other mechanical components and systems

duties_responsibilities.duty: Setup test benches and equipment Integration of Hardware and Software Test/Product Debug Verification and Validation Test Station, Set up and Cables Documentation Customer Support

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science Engineering (Master's preferred)
